mapper.insert: INSERT INTO vehicle( model, brand, color, battery_type, code, displacement, license, type, create_time, update_time, user_id ) VALUES( #{model}, #{brand}, #{color}, #{batteryType}, #{code}, #{displacement}, #{license}, #{type}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{userId} )
mapper.select:
SELECT id,battery_type as batteryType,brand,code,color, create_time as createTime,displacement,license,model, type,update_time as updateTime,user_id as userId FROM vehicle
AND brand LIKE CONCAT('%',#{query.brand},'%')
AND license LIKE CONCAT('%',#{query.license},'%')
AND user_id=#{userId}
